snippet: With two games remaining, the tournament had drawn an average crowd of 45,491, nearly double that at last year’s tournament in Chile.
lead_paragraph: With two games remaining, the tournament had drawn an average crowd of 45,491, nearly double that at last year’s tournament in Chile.
